instruction: Draft an email informing your team about the upcoming company retreat.
output:
Dear Team,

I am excited to announce our upcoming company retreat! We will be heading to a beautiful beach resort for a weekend getaway. There will be lots of activities for us to take part in, such as team building exercises, sight-seeing, and relaxing. This will be an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and work on strengthening our team spirit.

Let’s all make an effort to join together and make the most out of this retreat. I look forward to seeing you all there!

Cheers,
[Your Name]
